description:
As a kid, have you ever dreamed of being an air traffic controller, managing the flights of hundreds of toy planes and passengers? Well, now you can with Airport, the new traffic management game for Nintendo Switch™!

Airport is a perfect party game, or a challenge to play alone. Each level is a beautiful and intricate clockwork machine, waiting for its players. Up to four players can team up and control the airport together, or you can play solo and see how good you are.

If you like games that are easy to pick up and play, but hard to master, you will love Airport. It is a game that will make you feel like a kid again, playing with your favorite toys and having fun. 

Airport has more than 50 levels of increasing difficulty and complexity, each with its own objectives and challenges. If you are looking for even more challenge, you can try the unlockable hard mode, which will test your skills and coordination even more.

Airport is available now on Nintendo Switch™, so grab your controllers and get ready for takeoff!
name: Airport
